1: וַ֭יַּעַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answered</n> אֱלִיפַ֥ז <sup>464 </sup> <n>Then Eliphaz</n> הַֽתֵּימָנִ֗י <sup>8489 </sup> <n>the Temanite</n> וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n>
2: הֲנִסָּ֬ה <sup>5254 </sup> <n>[If] we assay</n> דָבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>to commune</n> אֵלֶ֣יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>you</n> תִּלְאֶ֑ה <sup>3811 </sup> <n>with thee wilt thou be grieved</n> וַעְצֹ֥ר <sup>6113 </sup> <n>withhold</n> בְּ֝מִלִּ֗ין <sup>4405 </sup> <n>answer</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>any</n> יוּכָֽל׃ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>? but who can</n>
3: הִ֭נֵּה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> יִסַּ֣רְתָּ <sup>3256 </sup> <n>Behold thou hast instructed</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> וְיָדַ֖יִם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hands</n> רָפ֣וֹת <sup>7504 </sup> <n>the weak</n> תְּחַזֵּֽק׃ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and thou hast strengthened</n>
4: כּ֭וֹשֵׁל <sup>3782 </sup> <n>him that was falling</n> יְקִימ֣וּן <sup>6965 </sup> <n>have upholden</n> מִלֶּ֑יךָ <sup>4405 </sup> <n>Thy words</n> וּבִרְכַּ֖יִם <sup>1290 </sup> <n>knees</n> כֹּרְע֣וֹת <sup>3766 </sup> <n>the feeble</n> תְּאַמֵּֽץ׃ <sup>553 </sup> <n>and thou hast strengthened</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>But</n> עַתָּ֨ה ׀ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> תָּב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>But now it is come</n> אֵלֶ֣יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> וַתֵּ֑לֶא <sup>3811 </sup> <n>upon thee and thou faintest</n> תִּגַּ֥ע <sup>5060 </sup> <n>it toucheth</n> עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>and you</n> וַתִּבָּהֵֽל׃ <sup>926 </sup> <n>thee and thou art troubled</n>
6: הֲלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִ֭רְאָתְךָ <sup>3373 </sup> <n>afraid</n> כִּסְלָתֶ֑ךָ <sup>3690 </sup> <n>thy confidence</n> תִּ֝קְוָתְךָ֗ <sup>8615 </sup> <n>thy hope</n> וְתֹ֣ם <sup>8537 </sup> <n>and the uprightness</n> דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>of your ways</n>
7: זְכָר־ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> נָ֗א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נָקִ֣י <sup>5355 </sup> <n>blameless</n> אָבָ֑ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>I pray thee who [ever] perished</n> וְ֝אֵיפֹ֗ה <sup>375 </sup> <n>what manner</n> יְשָׁרִ֥ים <sup>3477 </sup> <n>were the righteous</n> נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <sup>3582 </sup> <n>cut off</n>
8: כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to what</n> רָ֭אִיתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Even as I have seen</n> חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <sup>2790 </sup> <n>they that plow</n> אָ֑וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> וְזֹרְעֵ֖י <sup>2232 </sup> <n>and sow</n> עָמָ֣ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>wickedness</n> יִקְצְרֻֽהוּ׃ <sup>7114 </sup> <n>reap</n>
9: מִנִּשְׁמַ֣ת <sup>5397 </sup> <n>By the blast</n> אֱל֣וֹהַ <sup>433 </sup> <n>of God</n> יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <sup>6 </sup> <n>they perish</n> וּמֵר֖וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and by the breath</n> אַפּ֣וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>of his nostrils</n> יִכְלֽוּ׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>are they consumed</n>
10: שַׁאֲגַ֣ת <sup>7581 </sup> <n>The roaring</n> אַ֭רְיֵה <sup>738 </sup> <n>of the lion</n> וְק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>and the voice</n> שָׁ֑חַל <sup>7826 </sup> <n>of the fierce lion</n> וְשִׁנֵּ֖י <sup>8127 </sup> <n>and the teeth</n> כְפִירִ֣ים <sup>3715 </sup> <n>of the young lions</n> נִתָּֽעוּ׃ <sup>5421 </sup> <n>are broken</n>
11: לַ֭יִשׁ <sup>3918 </sup> <n>The old lion</n> אֹבֵ֣ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>perisheth</n> מִבְּלִי־ <sup>1097 </sup> <n>for lack</n> טָ֑רֶף <sup>2964 </sup> <n>of prey</n> וּבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>whelps</n> לָ֝בִ֗יא <sup>3833 </sup> <n>and the stout lion's</n> יִתְפָּרָֽדוּ׃ <sup>6504 </sup> <n>are scattered abroad</n>
12: וְ֭אֵלַי <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> דָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Now a thing</n> יְגֻנָּ֑ב <sup>1589 </sup> <n>was secretly brought</n> וַתִּקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>received</n> אָ֝זְנִ֗י <sup>241 </sup> <n>to me and mine ear</n> שֵׁ֣מֶץ <sup>8102 </sup> <n>a little</n> מֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>In</n>
13: בִּ֭שְׂעִפִּים <sup>5587 </sup> <n>In thoughts</n> מֵחֶזְיֹנ֣וֹת <sup>2384 </sup> <n>from the visions</n> לָ֑יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>of the night</n> בִּנְפֹ֥ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>falleth</n> תַּ֝רְדֵּמָ֗ה <sup>8639 </sup> <n>when deep sleep</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n>
14: פַּ֣חַד <sup>6343 </sup> <n>Fear</n> קְ֭רָאַנִי <sup>7122 </sup> <n>came</n> וּרְעָדָ֑ה <sup>7460 </sup> <n>tremble</n> וְרֹ֖ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>which made all</n> עַצְמוֹתַ֣י <sup>6106 </sup> <n>my bones</n> הִפְחִֽיד׃ <sup>6342 </sup> <n>to shake</n>
15: וְ֭רוּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>Then a spirit</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> פָּנַ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before my face</n> יַחֲלֹ֑ף <sup>2498 </sup> <n>passed</n> תְּ֝סַמֵּ֗ר <sup>5568 </sup> <n>stood up</n> שַֽׂעֲרַ֥ת <sup>8185 </sup> <n>the hair</n> בְּשָׂרִֽי׃ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>of my flesh</n>
16: יַעֲמֹ֤ד ׀ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>It stood still</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַכִּ֬יר <sup>5234 </sup> <n>but I could not discern</n> מַרְאֵ֗הוּ <sup>4758 </sup> <n>the form</n> תְּ֭מוּנָה <sup>8544 </sup> <n>thereof an image</n> לְנֶ֣גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> עֵינָ֑י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>[was] before mine eyes</n> דְּמָמָ֖ה <sup>1827 </sup> <n>[there was] silence</n> וָק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>a voice</n> אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and I heard</n>
17: הַֽ֭אֱנוֹשׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>he</n> מֵאֱל֣וֹהַ <sup>433 </sup> <n>God</n> יִצְדָּ֑ק <sup>6663 </sup> <n>be more just</n> אִ֥ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> מֵ֝עֹשֵׂ֗הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>than his maker</n> יִטְהַר־ <sup>2891 </sup> <n>be more pure</n> גָּֽבֶר׃ <sup>1397 </sup> <n>every one</n>
18: הֵ֣ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>even</n> בַּ֭עֲבָדָיו <sup>5650 </sup> <n>in his servants</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יַאֲמִ֑ין <sup>539 </sup> <n>Behold he put no trust</n> וּ֝בְמַלְאָכָ֗יו <sup>4397 </sup> <n>and his angels</n> יָשִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>he charged</n> תָּהֳלָֽה׃ <sup>8417 </sup> <n>with folly</n>
19: אַ֤ף ׀ <sup>637 </sup> <n>How much less</n> שֹׁכְנֵ֬י <sup>7931 </sup> <n>[in] them that dwell</n> בָֽתֵּי־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in houses</n> חֹ֗מֶר <sup>2563 </sup> <n>of clay</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Whose</n> בֶּעָפָ֥ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>[is] in the dust</n> יְסוֹדָ֑ם <sup>3247 </sup> <n>whose foundation</n> יְ֝דַכְּא֗וּם <sup>1792 </sup> <n>[which] are crushed</n> לִפְנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> עָֽשׁ׃ <sup>6211 </sup> <n>the moth</n>
20: מִבֹּ֣קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>from morning</n> לָעֶ֣רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>to evening</n> יֻכַּ֑תּוּ <sup>3807 </sup> <n>They are destroyed</n> מִבְּלִ֥י <sup>1097 </sup> <n>corruption</n> מֵ֝שִׂ֗ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>without any regarding</n> לָנֶ֥צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>for ever</n> יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <sup>6 </sup> <n>they perish</n>
21: הֲלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> נִסַּ֣ע <sup>5265 </sup> <n>[which is] in them go away</n> יִתְרָ֣ם <sup>3499 </sup> <n>Doth not their excellency</n> בָּ֑ם יָ֝מ֗וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>? they die</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> בְחָכְמָֽה׃ <sup>2451 </sup> <n>even without wisdom</n>
